vote.text: Amendment SA 1047 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 48. Record Vote Number: 134.

action.text: Amendment SA 1047 proposed by Senator Sanders for Senator Kaine. (consideration: CR S1998, S2014; text: CR S1998; text as modified: CR S2014) To provide for sequestration replacement.
